capabilities.name: get-position
capabilities.description: Get the current position of the bot

capabilities.name: move-to-position
capabilities.description: Move the bot to a specific position

capabilities.name: look-at
capabilities.description: Make the bot look at a specific position

capabilities.name: move-in-direction
capabilities.description: Move the bot in a specific direction for a duration

capabilities.name: list-inventory
capabilities.description: List all items in the bot's inventory

capabilities.name: find-item
capabilities.description: Find a specific item in the bot's inventory

capabilities.name: place-block
capabilities.description: Place a block at the specified position

capabilities.name: dig-block
capabilities.description: Dig a block at the specified position

capabilities.name: get-block-info
capabilities.description: Get information about a block at the specified position

capabilities.name: find-block
capabilities.description: Find the nearest block of a specific type

capabilities.name: find-entity
capabilities.description: Find the nearest entity of a specific type
